snippet: Their focus, at a summit meeting Thursday, was seeking ways to reconcile the urgent need to stimulate growth with the increased budget discipline required under a new “fiscal compact.”
abstract: European leaders at a summit meeting seek ways to reconcile the urgent need to stimulate growth with the increased budget discipline required under a new 'fiscal compact'; jobless rate in the 17 euro zone countries rose in January to 10.7 percent, from 10.6 percent in December.

byline.original: By PAUL GEITNER and STEPHEN CASTLE
byline.contributor: David Jolly contributed reporting from Paris and Niki Kitsantonis from Athens.

lead_paragraph: Their focus, at a summit meeting Thursday, was seeking ways to reconcile the urgent need to stimulate growth with the increased budget discipline required under a new “fiscal compact.”

headline.seo: European Leaders Confront the Social Cost of Austerity
headline.main: European Leaders Challenged by Rise in Joblessness
headline.print_headline: European Leaders Address Effects of Austerity as Jobless Rate Swells
